text:
Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta (born 29 January 1945), or as he is often known, IBK, is a Malian politician. He was the President of Mali from 2013 to 2020. He was the Prime Minister of Mali from 1994 to 2000. He was he President of the National Assembly of Mali from 2002 to 2007.
In August 2020, he was taken hostage by a military coup and later resigned.
